resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Tip: Adjust sound cut off between indoor and outdoor

Tip: Adjust sound cut off between indoor and outdoor \n Using this button you can choose the what kind of a environment you are in and according to the place you can manually change the sound cutt off level.
Control your device through the app
Change the threshold level of your mics through advanced settings
Check the condition of your device by pressing the test button on the controls page
Never worry about your questions. Just signin and check the FAQ section or ping us through the contact us option
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> SWAT -> clear data

1.Is it safe to use a Bluetooth device near the head? 
 

Yes it is. Bluetooth is the name of a wireless technology that uses pulsed radio frequency signals. In De-Vibe Class 3 transmitters are used. They are the weakest and operate in a range of less than 10 meters and have a peak transmission power of 1 mW. Basically the technology used in De-Vibe won't give any matters to the health. 
 
 

2.How much time will the battery last on the device? 
 

Depends on the battery capacity the user selects when purchasing the device 
 
 

3.Can we replace the battery if the battery is dead? 
 

Yes. Batteries can be purchased in any shops which the devices are available. 
 
 

4.How to pair more than 1 device 
 

You can only connect to a one device at once. If you want to connect to another device unpair the device and reconnect by using bluetooth. 
 
 

5.How to Charge the device? 
 

Can charge the device through the charging port using the DC current or using a power bank. 
 
 

6.Can we use without a mobile phone?
 

Yes. But the controllers are placed in the mobile app. So the User will be able to on/off and to snooze only. 
 
 

7.What is the Snooze Button used for? 
 

This button is used to stop the continuously sounds from the different sources in the area. (Ex: Sound of a train) When the snooze button is pressed the device will stop vibrating for 10 seconds. 
 
 

8.How to get the correct threshold level for the app? 
 

When going to outdoor it is recommended to put the level more than 50%. When inside it is recommended to put the level less than 50% But it depends on the sound level.
